page.title: 15MODERN HOUSING
page.content: {MODERN HOUSING { In this Rural area there are quite a few modern houses amongst the country lanes.These houses are occupied by First and Second class families,most are well designed having large double-glazed windows and most having gardens spread over a wide area.Some of these houses have large Patios and may even have swimming pools.These houses are luxurious to live in.The people who own these houses have good security and are well paid,and mainly have an occupation as lawyers or accountants. Families are on average made up of four or five people.
